segments.text: I see the water pouring over the edge of the sink, creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit surprised that she hasn't noticed the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the children behind her, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is being a bit reckless, standing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if their mother knows what they're up to.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit amused by their antics, but also concerned.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the puddle getting bigger, and it's making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone needs to warn her about the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she realizes what's happening before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit anxious, just watching this scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
